website_summaries.verdict: Perfect for outdoor use; a crisp, clear, and loud speaker. Offers exceptional value for money.
pros: Stands out for its rugged waterproof construction
Small enough to be highly portable
Comes with a strap for easy transportation
Can be paired with a second speaker for stereo sound
cons: 6-hour battery life may not be enough for all consumers

customer_reviews.title: not waterproof
customer_reviews.text: sound was pretty good but after two weeks and some splashes of water the volume buttons stopped working.
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Bose speaker stops charging
customer_reviews.text: After using the speaker several times the unit would not charge. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money!
customer_reviews.text: Worst sounding speaker ever! Can’t believe I waited so long and was so excited to get this for my birthday. What a disappointment and amazin is no help since we made the mistake of waiting to open it. Really a Bose that is a piece of crap?
customer_reviews.author: Careful Consumer

customer_reviews.title: I have only had this for a few months and it will no longer charge.
customer_reviews.text: It was a great speaker while it worked but now its just a paperweight. Very frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Weeden

customer_reviews.title: Super quiet, old USB charging port
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy this it is trash, can't hear it unless you are some where quiet defeats the purpose of being able to clip it to something while you are being active. Total trash. It also uses the old style USB charger and it is super hard to connect.
customer_reviews.author: Scott T.

customer_reviews.title: Not Bose Quality
customer_reviews.text: New out of the box the speaker would not charge. Item returned immediately
customer_reviews.author: Tim S

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: I am not a big fan of Bose products, but I looked at the reviews on Youtube,. Then I found it at the airport, tried it and was impressed by the sound coming out of such a small package.Bought it, but my friend heard it and he was going away the next day. He made me sell mine to him so I ordered another one. Very nice product.
customer_reviews.author: sailorboy414

customer_reviews.title: DON'T BUY UNLESS . . . .
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this Bose Bluetooth speaker to use with my new TV and because of all the stuff I have heard about how wonderful Bose is when it comes to sound along with the many good reviews. Unfortunately, I find it quite disturbing to use as there is too much base and it has an unclear muddy sound. I would like to return it, but it appears that I'm stuck with it. Perhaps it might be enjoyed if one were using it for rock and roll or camping (as advertised), but it's not good for using with TV conversations. Does not suit my purpose for it at all.
customer_reviews.author: Calamity Jane

customer_reviews.title: Speaker is good, but the app for stereo or party mode is a shame
customer_reviews.text: Sound is good as of any BOSE speaker. Size is also a plus. The only complaint if for the BOSE DIrect App which is needed for stereo or party mode. It will force you to share your location which is a deal breaker for me and for anyone concerned about privacy. BOSE, you should know better.
customer_reviews.author: Martin

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work for zoom, WebEx, Skype, etc.
customer_reviews.text: Bought the speaker to use as a speakerphone for zoom. Tried to connect to a zoom meeting and the speaker wouldn't work, just kept saying "call ended" over and over. Turns out the speaker doesn't support HSP, so it won't work with zoom, Skype, WebEx, or anything. Anyone looking for a speakerphone to make zoom calls better during this pandemic should look to another product.
customer_reviews.author: nprater

customer_reviews.title: DON'T BOTHER
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Bose SoundLink Micro Portable Outdoor Speaker in July 2018. Here it is 15 months later, and the thing died on me. It's fully charged, but won't turn on, won't respond to any attempts to revive it. I thought by paying more for a Bose product, I'd be getting high quality and something built to last. Forget it. While it was working, it was great. Easy to use, excellent sound quality and connectivity. But if it's only going to work for 15 months, what's the point. I've already ordered another cheaper speaker, and you can bet it's not a Bose. I will not bother with this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: lefteyetwitch

customer_reviews.title: Truly compact; clear sound; issues with USB cables and Whatsapp or similar apps
customer_reviews.text: + Clear sound. + Truly compact, see pictures where I hold it (I have average sized hands). + Travels well (i.e. small and rather slim profile); no issues with getting wet either. - Doesn't work with all USB cables (this is a know issue, reported many times in multiple forums) so keep the cable it comes from. - Mic only works with regular phone calls, it won't handle WhatsApp or similar app (this is a know limitation, reported many times in multiple forums).
customer_reviews.author: The average tech buyer

customer_reviews.title: very disappointed with this product
customer_reviews.text: this brand new Bose speaker was really amazing and everything i wanted UNTIL after using it for ONE MONTH. Now the $80 speaker WILL NOT CHARGE despite my repeated attempts at trouble shooting. Amazon gave me less than a month to return this item, but that doesn't matter because it was rendered completely USELESS a few days after the window. huge bummer these days that buying the prestigious BOSE brand now comes with a major lack of confidence in it's ability; there are off brands i've experienced, that have more life than this. very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Keeler Sandhaus

customer_reviews.title: Sounds like a blown speaker
customer_reviews.text: It sounded great for the first several months. Now it rattles like a blown speaker. It is very noticeable when playing talk radio.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth is not universal
customer_reviews.text: Seems to want to pair with every device around. When we try to pair just about anything in the house, this is the first thing that jumps in and grabs them. So we have to make sure it is in the far corner of the house and turned off if we are trying to pair any other device. It also has some funky version of Bluetooth that has volume issues with some transmitters (like the TROND transmitter). They will only play real softly regardless of the volume of the device or the speaker. That being said, the sound quality is really quite good.
customer_reviews.author: Tutu Pupule

customer_reviews.title: Dull and muffled sound
customer_reviews.text: As someone who enjoys listening to music through a set of Bose desktop speakers and on a Bose Wave music system, I'm pretty disappointed with the SoundLink Micro. While it can play music at a decent volume, music sounds slurred and loses both high and low notes. As someone else noted, vocals sound as if the singer is suffering from a bad head-cold, and the music is muffled and dull. On the positive side, the SoundLink Micro is easy to set up, is compact and durable, and can be used while on the go.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Perkins

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I wanted this for talk radio in the shower, but there is too much base for talk radio.
customer_reviews.author: Sir Richard Dannatt

customer_reviews.title: Quality isn’t high enough for the price point.
customer_reviews.text: I’m a fan of Bose and this Little is pretty awesome. However, when you get it to the top volume the sound quality is terrible. I was shocked since that’s why I spend good money on Bose products. Also, the battery never charges to 100%, only 90 and it seems to go through that pretty fast. Nice speaker- NOT worth $100 $60 and I would have given it more starts.
customer_reviews.author: Liz is Shopping

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic for the shower
customer_reviews.text: Compared to the other two “shower” style speakers we’ve previously owned, the Bose Soundlink Micro unit is by far the best. Yes, the Bose is more expensive ... but the sound quality (great bass) and battery life are far superior to the others. We have also owned several Bose Wave systems for many years and nobody should expect the little Bluetooth speaker to be anywhere near the Wave’s sound quality (of course, a Wave system is 5 or 6 times more expensive). For "pool side" the Soundlink Micro might not be very impressive, but in the shower we think it's great.
customer_reviews.author: Dan J

customer_reviews.title: Good Things Come in Small Packages
customer_reviews.text: I really wasn't sure what to expect, but I am ever so pleased. The full-bodied sound coming from this little item took my breath away. I've been using two little Jam speakers which have been okay with the Echo Dot, tablet, and phone, but the Bose Soundlink Micro is so much better. I can just throw it into my handbag with my phone because it is not bulky. I like that I can take it with me on the go. It is a super good extra speaker and I happily recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Elle B.

customer_reviews.title: I love this speaker so much that I bought a second ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this speaker so much that I bought a second one for my sister. I travel frequently for work and I always throw this in my bag. The battery is better than the original SoundLink Color. It’s compact, easy to use, sounds great, and best of all its waterproof! I’ve only showered with it but wouldn’t hesitate to take it to the pool with me. I’ve had zero issues with this speaker. It’s used daily and I’ve had it since August of 2017. I will most likely purchase another one to link with my first unit for “party mode” during camping trips.
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Blown away! Best quality sound! Solution for cars without WiFi.
customer_reviews.text: I have an older Volvo, a classic, without bluetooth or wifi. I'd tried to have the car retrofitted, but ridiculously expensive and the existing not to great AM-FM/6-CD player is tightly integrated in a center console with climate control and other functions. Everything would have been impacted. This tiny Bluetooth speaker solves the problem. I not only can play my own tunes but also can take phone calls. Speaker has a built-in microphone. I can receive calls easily and get better fidelity than the iPhone. I listen primarily to Jazz and Classical. I'm totally pleased that the built-in equalization handles the complexity of each genre perfectly. Winner product! My friends who have heard it immediately purchased their own.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Spade

customer_reviews.title: Getting a second speaker!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great speaker. I enjoy speaking on the cell phone via the speaker vs. carrying my cell phone around the house. It's loud but not super loud but kicks out sound much louder than I expected from a speaker this compact. It travels well and is perfect for my needs. I plan to purchase a second speaker for the second level of the house. I didn't give it 5 stars because it lacks a carrying case (for the price it should come with) and I've had intermittent connectivity issues but it quickly reconnects. This is to be expected with most Bluetooth technology. Definitely recconnend this item.
customer_reviews.author: kglee

customer_reviews.title: One Major Flaw!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome sound... love everything about it... except one major flaw! You can't turn it off!! When it is synced to a device it will turn on automatically when that device has bluetooth on. When synced to my computer it turns on all the time at many inconvenient moments. Do not buy this product if you will use it with a laptop for presentations or better sound. Read the Bose forum on their website. Repeatedly asked to fix this issue from individuals and they have never addressed it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wasn’t happy with the product.
customer_reviews.text: While the sound and the overall speaker may be great, the strap, more so how it butters, has a lot to be desired. I would be afraid to strap this to the handlebars of my bike worried about the strap popping open and the speaker falling each time I go over a bump. I didn’t want to risk damaging a $80 speaker during my first ride so I decided to send the product back for a refund. I was disappointed as I was expecting much more from a company like Bose.
customer_reviews.author: Jason A.

customer_reviews.title: Fully charged battery lasted only 2.75 hours.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my long distance runs. I routinely run 3+ hours. Tried it fully charged at full volume it lasted only 2 hours 45 minutes. Don't know if full volume uses more of the battery? But I needed full volume to listen while running out in the elements. It connects easily to the bluetooth on my phone, however the app will not even connect. Pretty useless for me if it won't play for my typical long runs. I will likely return. Edit. I contacted Bose and at full volume, the expected battery life is only 2.5 hours. Returning the unit
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Schultz

customer_reviews.title: Large sound from a micro speaker! 👍
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic speaker and sounds a lot larger than its size. Coming from a UE Boom which I’ve had for several years. Love the compact size of this speaker and it connected instantly. Using an iPhone and not sure what other Reviewers are talking about that say it’s hard to connect. Couldn’t be much easier. I’d say connect using your phones Bluetooth first then download and open the Bose connect app. Definitely recommend this speaker for its size and sound quality. Will definitely be using this for travel and poolside activities. Love the orange color btw. Went with this so I could easily keep track of it.
customer_reviews.author: CigarDaze

customer_reviews.title: Good things come in small packages!  What a great little speaker!
customer_reviews.text: This little speaker has amazing sound and amazing battery life. Whether you are an audiobook fan or a music fan, it connects easily to my iPhone/iPad. I spent a little more than I've spent in the past on speakers, but I am thrilled with it and use it every day. It helps me start my day with news or music as I'm getting ready. It's extremely portable and for a small speaker has incredible sound. I also use it at the end of the day to wind down with relaxing music. I listen to all types of music (Rock, Classical, Bluegrass) and it really captures all sounds well.
customer_reviews.author: TeamDowager

customer_reviews.title: Charger didn’t fit.
customer_reviews.text: The charger that came with this speaker did not fit into the charging port. Of course I bought this as a gift for my mom, so I didn’t know it was defective until she tried to set it up and called me for help. Will be returning this and getting her a different Bluetooth speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Delmar

customer_reviews.title: Great (WHEN it connects)!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this speaker for two years now. It's a great speaker when it connects. "When" being the key word. It is SO annoying to connect - it takes forever, I have to turn bluetooth off and on multiple times on my phone and computer, have to "connect new" from the app all the time, and then disconnects randomly, making you having to do it again and again. I love the Bose sound, but damn having to fiddle with this thing every second is so frustrating - why can't it automatically connect in an easy way?? Save your money, and get a speaker with a cable or from another company who can connect through Bluetooth seamlessly.
customer_reviews.author: S. Davis

customer_reviews.title: SOOOOO disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I should be able to give it 5 stars. Great sound, long-lasting battery, easy pairing. everything you expect from a Bose product. HOWEVER, it is gone at 18 months. It was on sale for $69 a few weeks ago. I debated about buying it again. I decided that I did not want to give Bose my money. I just expected it would last me for years but NO. I bought a cheaper little speaker. If it dies, it won't hurt my pocketbook as much.
customer_reviews.author: U, Fox

customer_reviews.title: Don't  buy. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this product last Dec. 5, 2019 and used only few times. Now, the power doesn't turn on even though it was fully charged and the LED light remained on. Now, I tried to have it service in Bose site but when I put in the serial no. It says that it's out of warranty. I just purchased it 5months ago. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Lalah

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. However trying to compare the sound to the bose mini soundlink, it's not even close. This unit was purchased for going Kayaking and fishing, and it's going to get wet. So far this unit shines in the shower, big sound, moderate bass. I've had other small bluetooth speakers, but this one sounds the best, rich and full for its tiny size. If this unit was made a little larger and had the same sound as bose color, I would have ranked it 5 stars. At the end of the day, undercooked cookies are still cookies.
customer_reviews.author: JAH

customer_reviews.title: Great Speaker for Traveling
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Bose SoundLink Micro Bluetooth Speaker, for a two month trip I was making to South America. I have owned numerous Bose products over the years and been pleased with all of them. This is no exception. Full rich sound with adequate base. It's heavier than some of the alternatives, but the superior sound makes it worthwhile to me to haul it around. Bluetooth can be difficult when connecting to a device for the first time, but after that, connects seamlessly. Very helpful to download the Bose connection app from Apple or GooglePlay. Work well during car travel with bluetooth connectivity. Recommended for those who want great, portable sound.
customer_reviews.author: J. Seymour

customer_reviews.title: Way better than others
customer_reviews.text: You know how every little battery-operated bluetooth speaker claims to be "loud." This is the first one I've had that actually is LOUD. I can crank this up to offensively loud levels. And rather than attempt to create a visual means to display battery life and connected status, this uses a voice. Turn it on and it announces the battery level. When it connects, it not only announces "connected" but names the device to which it is connected. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: rbgilbert

customer_reviews.title: Bose Quality, Superior
customer_reviews.text: I am addicted to great sound and portability. This is only one of many Bose products I own and am completely satisfied. The sound is loud and clear and works flawlessly with other Soundlink Bose Bluetooth speakers in stereo or party mode. I use these when I travel, hotel rooms, pools and outdoor, pretty much anywhere I want to hear high-quality music. I own other great speakers such as JVC and love them too but these Bose simply outperform all of my other speakers combined.
customer_reviews.author: B. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Limited use with short lifespan
customer_reviews.text: We had the device for a little over a year. Used it intermittently and the sound was great. We had a few issues that firmware updates fixed but it no longer functions. Support was not helpful as it was just out of warranty. I would not recommend this device. There are several others available at a fraction of the price with decent sound. You could buy three of them and be much less concerned if you happen to run into the same issue we experienced.
customer_reviews.author: Eric B

customer_reviews.title: Great for its size
customer_reviews.text: The bass isn't as good as the full size SoundLink color. I use this as a white noise speaker for sleeping, connected via Bluetooth to my iPhone running a white noise app. The bass was definitely better on my Color, however that one recently stopped working as the cord connection became loose. The Micro will be better for traveling and takes up less space. It looks great as well. The verdict is still out whether or not I'll go back to the Color, but for now this works great.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel E

customer_reviews.title: Bose hits it outta the park!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! Am I ever satisfied with this Micro-SoundLink. I bought it to be able to have tunes on a sailboat trip this summer. It filled the cabin with wonderful, clean, clear music. The bass is full and well balanced. My mates were amazed and pleased. It played from morning till late at night the whole time. Flawless Bluetooth docking from multiple sources. Very good battery life, quick to charge. Sturdy rubberized splash-proof outer shell. Now I use it constantly at home. I own a Bose SoundLink-Mini, but this one sounds even better and is so easy to cart around from room to room. In my opinion, it is the apex of small Bluetooth speakers.
customer_reviews.author: jazm44

customer_reviews.title: NOT WATERPROOF!
customer_reviews.text: This is directly from the user manual. Note NOT WATERPROOF!! The speaker is rated IPX7 water resistant and IPX4 splash resistant. It can be immersed in water for up to 30 minutes at a depth of 3.2 ft. (1 m). It can be used while ­showering and in the rain or snow. Caution: Do NOT submerge this speaker in any pool of water deeper than 3.2 ft. (1 m). Caution: Do NOT attempt to charge the speaker while it is wet. Doing so may cause damage to the speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: Bose is the Best
customer_reviews.text: I had to have a bose but couldn't find the one I was looking for and settled for this due to the mobility and the price...OMG I just tested and its sooo loud and clear ...now I don't think I need another one as I was thinking....and to top it off its waterproof...I wont be testing that feature..but for quality, sound, clarity, and price..this is an excellent product that wont take up much space either.
customer_reviews.author: RRR

customer_reviews.title: Bose puts big things in small packages!
customer_reviews.text: I just received this speaker. It was very easy to charge and seamless to connect to Bluetooth. I started to play music from my iPhone and was stunned with the quality of the sound. I had to walk around this little unit a couple of times to wrap my mind around how good it sounded. The music was nicely balanced across volume levels. I imagine that there would be some genres of music that would push this speaker a little past the limits at the upper volume range, but for the music I listen to this speaker is pretty amazing. I really like the portability. I guess I could say that Bose made speakers great again-again;)
customer_reviews.author: drsteve

customer_reviews.title: Good Sound Quality and Impressive Volume for Size
customer_reviews.text: Considering the size and cost, the sound is pretty good; but it does not sound like a full-blown stereo system (not surprisingly). At high sound levels, the sound quality diminishes, which is to be expected. My old SoundLink II sounds slightly better. But, this speaker feels like quality and is good bang for the buck (I paid $69, I think). I purchased it for my romantic partner so she could use it in her car with an Amazon Echo Auto. It is compatible with that. But, doesn't sound quite as good as her car's system (which is missing the Bluetooth or audio input that Amazon Echo Auto requires).
customer_reviews.author: Reed White

customer_reviews.title: What can I say...it's a BOSE
customer_reviews.text: Best purchase I've made in a long while. I have an older car so no bluetooth capabilities for my cell phone so I searched around and came across this on a Lightning Deal and I couldn't be happier. It has definitely made "safe driving while needing to use the phone" safer. I have had no issue with sound quality and while driving freeway speed, I had the volume set fairly high to make sure I could be heard as well as able to hear the person on the other end of the call. I would recommend this compact speaker for anyone looking for sleek and ease of use.
customer_reviews.author: Lily Tang

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sound - low reliability
customer_reviews.text: The sound is incredible, and super easy to connect multiple devices. It only has a one year warranty, and even though I didn't start using it till the warranty was almost complete, it failed after just a dozen hours of use. At that time, it stopped taking a charge. The light blinks as advertised. I've tried using several different chargers and cables, it just won't charge and continues to say "Battery low". They do offer to sell another at a lower cost - but they don't tell you what that cost is or how to get it
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Ronald C. Markham

customer_reviews.title: Great sound for such small speakers
customer_reviews.text: Bought these speakers to use outdoors with my new hot tub. Our original hot tub had built in speakers with a CD player and radio. Unfortunately, most new hot tubs do not have these features any more. These speakers are great! They are powerful and loud even over the sound of the hot tub's motors. I particularly like that you can link two of them to give you stereo sound and they do give you stereo sound. If for some reason they happen to fall into the hot tub, they should still be ok because they are waterproof. I am very happy with them & would definitely recommend purchasing a pair of them.
customer_reviews.author: B. O'Malia

customer_reviews.title: Amazing music device!
customer_reviews.text: It's so tiny yet powerful. I've taken it to everywhere: a party, a pool. trekking, crossfit, running, it works flawlessly. I've chosen this one to be the main speaker for my bedroom ( I even have a Bose Soundlink 2 but this one is way easier to charge). You can't go wrong with this one. Oh, btw the blue one is the perfect color.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Maddox

customer_reviews.title: Great Golf Course Speaker
customer_reviews.text: Really good sound for the size, The strap works great for golf carts or golf push carts. Also the sound is pretty directional, so if you can control who hears the music and who doesn't. The battery last way more than 5 hours and it hooks up to bluetooth almost instantly. Only issue is that it really doesn't work to link to another one on a different golf cart. If you get more than about 40 ft away, they start cutting out. This was the reason myself and my friend bought it, but still it's a great speaker for the golf course.
customer_reviews.author: Brent

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound for a decent size room
customer_reviews.text: Soo much sound in such a small box!! Pairs easily via bluetooth and the Bose Connect app makes it more flexible to control the songs list. Can make and receive calls which is an added bonus. Something to note.. the connection does get interrupted when there are obstacles on the way, such as using the phone from next room separated by a wall while connected to the speaker. But this is already mentioned on their website and is not a surprise or deal breaker. The speaker is ideal for single room usage or outdoors as long as the phone that is connected via bluetooth is in near sight of the speaker. Worth a buy!!
customer_reviews.author: NV

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, but the controls suck.
customer_reviews.text: Packs some amazing sound for such a small speaker. But it drives me crazy there's no Next/Back buttons to advance tracks. Also, it drives me even more crazy that if you disconnect one of your devices, the speaker will continue to announce "WAITING TO CONNECT".... a minute later "WAITING TO CONNECT" over and over for who knows how long. I like to listen to music at bedtime and have been in bed and disconnected my phone from bluetooth....only to have that stupid voice wake me up and have to crawl out of bed to find the thing.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Ridiculously hard to connect
customer_reviews.text: Recommended by CNET, I went for this speaker. After an hour of trying to connect to my newish computer, including downloading update software as instructed which is ridiculous, I repacked to send back. I tried my roommate's JB speaker same cost which connected in seconds, sounds great no download required. This is the second Bose Soundlink I have tried. The first one stopped working in less than a year. No more Bose for me.
customer_reviews.author: Pennell Hopkins

customer_reviews.title: GREAT BATTERY LIFE
customer_reviews.text: I took this little speaker on our trip to the lake over this past week. It was at 100% when we started. I used it 4 nights in a row and a little bit here and there throughout other times over those 4 days and didn't run out of battery!!! GREAT purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Renay C.

customer_reviews.title: After going Bose, you won't go back.
customer_reviews.text: Can't tell you how many cheap $20-$40 bluetooth micro speakers I bought over the years... then I had some extra $$$ and decided to invest in one of these bad boys (I demo'd it at Target). WOW... this thing is great. So great I went out and bought 2 more... You can also link two together... I wish you could link more of them together. HIGHLY recommend. I will be a BOSE believer from here on out. Oh and they are STURDY! I have been biking down the street and this thing falls out of my bungee cable and it goes bouncing/rolling down the street haha... and it's not even damaged one bit. Like a sherman tank!
customer_reviews.author: Mc Primes

customer_reviews.title: 4 months and its done.
customer_reviews.text: Bought it November 2018 and it worked great! March 2019 and its dead. It won't power on. Only used inside house. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Insulator man

customer_reviews.title: JBL Flip 5 vs. Bose Micro
customer_reviews.text: I was between this and the JBL Flip 5. Ultimately, I went with the Flip 5 as I liked the overall "bump" in music that it provided, but I just as easily would have been satisfied with the Bose! The sound was crisp and I loved the overall size of it and the ability to attach it to things using the band that is attached to it. Definitely a hard decision to make between this and the JBL Flip 5, which is why they both get 5 stars in my book!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Great little speaker,
customer_reviews.text: I love this little speaker. This is the 3rd one I have purchased, not because there was anything wrong with them but because after purchasing one for myself I liked it so well I bought one for my daughter, then the last one for my son. I would have given this a 5 star rating but for the fact that I ordered a black speaker and black case, and received a black case and orange speaker. This obviously has no bearing on the product itself, as I love the quality and portability...I just happen to not like orange.
customer_reviews.author: JinnyM

customer_reviews.title: Auto on "feature" is terrible
customer_reviews.text: Bose put out a new firmware update for the speaker and now the speak automatically turns on whenever your device connects to it. There is currently no way for the user to disable this ridiculous feature. I get to wake up to music blaring at 5 in the morning and there's nothing I can do except turn the bluetooth off on my phone. Very dissatisfied. Don't buy this speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy K.

customer_reviews.title: Simple to use, Bose sound system 2nd to none
customer_reviews.text: Another quality product from Bose. Don't know why people place negative reviews on it. The sound is fantastic, loud, and base is incredible for such a small device. I use this every time we go hiking or working out in our home gym. Highly recommended. I mean, come on... it's Bose! What more do you need? Best of the best. Authentic Bose product if you're concerned about that. Zero issues with connectivity (by the way, you DON'T need the Bose app to connect to the speaker - the app just helps for convenience and updating the software). Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Aku

customer_reviews.title: A great quality little speaker!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband for Christmas. Every year I struggle to find a different type of gift. I came upon this and thought he would really enjoy it and boy was I right! He is about the least techie person you could find, but we got him connected to his phone and he loves this speaker!! He can take it out to “his man garage” and uses it in his Rangers. Now he can listen to his music and I can listen to mine! So perfect for traveling also. I have a larger Bose speaker and I was surprised at the quality sound of this little one. A great gift or one for yourself!
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda A. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Good for listening to tunes but needs improvement for talking on the phone
customer_reviews.text: I bought this during Amazon Prime Day due to the great deal ($69)! We already own one that we use in our shower and take kayaking. It was bought specifically for its waterproof capabilities. Great sound quality for listening to podcasts and music, but I feel like the bluetooth still needs work. When you talk on the phone with it, it is unclear at times to both parties.
customer_reviews.author: Christy

customer_reviews.title: Great sound quality
customer_reviews.text: We love the Bose SoundLInk speakers. After receiving one as a gift, I've now bought several for my family and friends. The sound quality is great, the size is small and easy to throw in a bag, and the connections for bluetooth are easy to make. We've also connected a couple together to have music playing in a couple of rooms during the holidays.
customer_reviews.author: 3pnutsinNH

customer_reviews.title: Awesome delivery by Amazon.
customer_reviews.text: Well, I. Did love it but it will only stay charged for 2.5 hours and is getting hot! It is breaking up and playing slow. :( I'll have to return it. Darn. This one must have an electrical short. It came brand new in the box. Thank you amazon for delivering so fast. My delivery was handed to me with all social distancing rules a was professional and took extra time to find me! I'm 😥.
customer_reviews.author: MA

customer_reviews.title: My goto travel speaker
customer_reviews.text: I've gone through many BT speakers and currently own three right now, including the SoundLink Micro. What I like about this speaker are the following... * Portability * Voice and light battery indicator * Dedicated buttons for power and BT * USB type for charging the device (same as my cellphone charger) * Sound quality is very good (not MINIRIG great, but very good) * The App is fine and I find it somewhat useful I don't like that it doesn't have a physical connector for audio. Only connector on the speaker is for charging. But overall, this speaker is now one of my fav. Solid purchase for the price.
customer_reviews.author: MarkUS

customer_reviews.title: DON’T WASTE YOUR MONEY
customer_reviews.text: Just DON’T BUY THIS! Sound is good but only for few months. Mine is not working after 3.5 months of light use, I haven’t even use it outside and the volume doesn’t work . You can barely hear it . Contacted the manufacturer and warranty is “3 months “ ! That’s a red flag for a company with a name like Bose, to offer such a short warranty for something that should be top of the line . I’m very upset I didn’t read it before purchase. Just save your money
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best speaker ever!
customer_reviews.text: The BEST speaker I have ever bought. I bought one for my sister for Christmas. We love it so much she actually bought me one back for Christmas. My brother was at the table when we were talking about how much we loved them, went on amazon and bought two for upstairs/downstairs. The battery life is super long. Turns off quickly after non-activity which really save the battery. Easy connection, amazing sound. Love the material that it is make out of. The silicon is super soft and durable. Distance of connection is really long as well. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer M

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: This is something you dont need but will surely want it if you have it. I use this speaker more than I thought I would. The battery like is excellent and it automatically connects to your bluetooth device with ease when you cut it on (you do have to download the app 1st before connecting but the manual explains). My only gripe is I wish the sound was a little bit louder but other than that the clarity of sound is good and it does hold up in water. I have put mine inside the shower with water getting on it and it still played well.
customer_reviews.author: Gina Gina

customer_reviews.title: Incredible Sound Quality
customer_reviews.text: I've lived with a $15 bluetooth speaker for many years and was totally satisfied, but oh, my goodness, what a difference there is in a Bose bluetooth speaker. Deciding I wanted a second speaker, I looked to see what was available. Being a fan of Bose products, when I saw the name, I looked no further. There are times that I'll use it all night, and in the morning it will have run down to maybe 80 percent. The charging time is amazingly fast. I can't say enough about this little speaker, and it fits in one of my hands.
customer_reviews.author: bluejean

customer_reviews.title: Does not operate properly in any environment
customer_reviews.text: This Bose model does not measure up to previous and larger models. I bought this for my wife to enjoy in her car as I enjoy a previous model in mine. After 2 to 3 minutes of Bluetooth connection the signal begins to break up with intermittent loss of signal for a second or two. I tried pairing it with 2 different iPhone 11 models and two different iPad models. I tried in car and in home. I tried on battery operation and playing while connected to power. Same results in every combination. Grant it is less expensive than other models but its operation is totally unacceptable. I’m applying for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Bill T

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, compact size
customer_reviews.text: This compact speaker packs a powerful punch without taking tons of space! I have always liked Bose products, which led me to purchase this as a gift for my Grandmother. It is easily operated with a touch of the power button and easily links up each time it is powered on. The remaining battery is indicated with lights on the top of the speaker. The sound quality that comes from this little guy is amazing! There are free apps to help with setup available for both Android and IOS. It is also compatible with her pc laptop and Kindle Fire. I am strongly considering adding one to our speaker arsenal also!
customer_reviews.author: Anna Itzen

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound Quality
customer_reviews.text: It's a Bose. I have brought this on a lot of trips (to the beach/coastline and other destinations) and is just durable. I have also used it for my daughters graduation party for background music and it was better than the huge speakers at the event which the restaurant typically provides. I have also used it at an outdoor event where people started looking for where the music was coming from and could hardly believe that it was coming from such a small device. If you want affordable Bose sound quality, this is it.
customer_reviews.author: Freemason Alex

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Quality
customer_reviews.text: Excellent in every way! The voice starts with battery power & ready to connect. The first charge, a week later I tried it for a few minutes after the first charge and didn't touch it until a week later and it was still at 100% power! The sound is amazing and loud! Like a boom box at a fraction of the size! Highly recommend buying this!
customer_reviews.author: John Landry

customer_reviews.title: Was hoping for better
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter for Christmas. She works in a factory and likes to hear her music, unfortunately the Bose speaker does not last even close to the 6 hours of music. She had it fully charged and got to work She listen to I heart radio via her phone to the speaker and it is only lasting about 2-3 hours which is a bummer since her phone lasts longer than that. I bought the warranty so I guess we will see about getting it replaced or something
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quit after only 1 year.
customer_reviews.text: After not even a year, the system stopped charging. No power. Nothing. I called Bose support and they told me that for $75 they will look at it and possibly put in new batteries. This is ridiculous. I spend $99 in the first place, why would I spend $75 to have them look at it. Bose really understands planned obsolescence! #neverbuybose
customer_reviews.author: Diana Macku

customer_reviews.title: Better than any car speaker I've had, and car thieves missed it during a car break-in!
customer_reviews.text: Because of its small size, when my car was recently broken into, the thieves failed to notice it under the seat. (I had it in a plain toiletries bag.) Hurrah! And the sound...the SOUND! Fabulous. I use it infrequently, but it works like a charm for streaming music or books from my smartphone. I alternate having the Bose plugged into the cig lighter for charging and the smartphone. Neither runs out of juice too fast. May buy another for the house.
customer_reviews.author: mistyake

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working. Would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: At first I really like this speaker. The sound was very good and it was a great size. I would bring it with me to the beach and it worked great. Unfortunately, after about 3 weeks it will no longer turn on. I called amazon customer support, and they are currently trying to contact Bose to get the manufacturer warranty completed. I did some research, and apparently this is not unusual for this type of speaker. I would not recommend buying this speaker for that one fact.
customer_reviews.author: James T

customer_reviews.title: Broke as soon as warranty ran out
customer_reviews.text: Stopped charging and paring with devices. Tried resetting it, new cable, all the online "help" that Bose offers to no avail. Their only advice was to buy another product at a special 20% discount off their website...which happens to be the full price listed here on amazon. So it's not even discounted. Why would I want to buy another one of these anyway if it's just going to break? I never moved it from my desk during its entire lifetime use. It just sat there connected to my laptop to be used as a primary speaker. Very dissatisfied with short product life and poor customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sound out of this little speaker and it goes everywhere!
customer_reviews.text: Love the quality of the speaker! The battery life is amazing and yes, you can use it while charging! We have taken it with us camping, we use it for lullabies while I grandson visits and trying to sleep. We use it while working in the back yard and so many other places! You don't have to use the bose app to make it work with your phone, but I did download it at first to make sure that all worked. You can also have multiple phones connected to it at once. I would highly recommend this and will buy again as a gift!
customer_reviews.author: Teresa A. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Spend the money, it's worth the difference.
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased several small blue tooth speakers that have all failed my expectations. I had one that died and would not recharge after about a month. Most sound like a tin can. I assumed that was the standard until I bought this one. Yes it is small but it has a surprising volume that does not compromise sound quality in the least. The sound does not crackle at high volumes and it has a nice warm sound to it. I brought it to work and all of my coworkers were impressed with how well it handles. Three others have purchased them for their offices and said that they will no longer accept the sound of music through a laptop!
customer_reviews.author: J. Z.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what it is
customer_reviews.text: Is this going to be the best Bose speaker you have ever heard? Not at all, it won't even be the best wireless speaker that you have heard. That being said, if you want a very portable speaker that is perfect for travel this is the one. I'm actually surprised that there is as much low end when placed on a table as this thing can produce. I am using it when I travel to listen to music in hotel rooms and am very happy with the sound. If you have the right expectations, you will be happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jason K.

customer_reviews.title: Great sound & very handy
customer_reviews.text: Got this speaker unit to connect to an Echo Dot for playing music. I am a novice at this, so it took a bit of research and training to get them to communicate with one another. However, once the connection was made, the sound was excellent. For some reason, the Bluetooth connection sometimes has to be renewed as each new playing session is begun due to periodic lapses in the sound. Once this re connection is made, it works perfectly. I am satisfied with this great-sounding speaker except for the initial problem with connection lapses. Of course, I am not certain whether it's due to the Echo Dot or the speaker itself.
customer_reviews.author: Philbo

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I work unloading trucks/stocking in my spare time, I strap this on my utility belt, though the silicone strap could use some work in the way it fastens, this little thing is tough! It kicks bass like a mini system in a car, I love that two can be paired for "party mode". While the volume of one isn't going to fill a house, it's loud enough as a personal speaker. Also a great option for people using laptops who want to watch a movie with some great sound quality! I definitely recommend, just have realistic expectations of a well-protected, portable speaker...even if it is bose.
customer_reviews.author: Suki

customer_reviews.title: Lower Your Expectations
customer_reviews.text: If you are like me, you have come to expect a lot out of these world renowned speakers. The sound quality and design is impressive. The functionality just works....until it doesn’t. Well, that’s ok. I will simply call Bose and they will rectify the obvious design problem as BOTH of my Soundlink Micro speakers stopped taking a charge on the same day, 1 1/2 years after purchase! Nope. That didn’t happen, but they would send me a new pair of speakers for $60 per speaker. No. From now on, I will be buying off brand cheap speakers that sound better and last longer and cost less. I won’t support this company who is obviously resting on its laurels.
customer_reviews.author: Paul W Jones

customer_reviews.title: Big sound from  micro speaker
customer_reviews.text: For the compact size,this thing puts out the sound! The day it came, we took it with us on our daily hike with the dog and I wore it on my belt. I have a nose acoustic wave and two Bose wave radios along with a sound link 2. This micro doesn't sound as crisp as these but its impressive for its size. I dont understanding how many reviews expect studio sound from the micro. I'm satisfied! The battery life so far is good. We listened for two hours so far and it had just above half a charge afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: Rocky's Dad

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Speaker!
customer_reviews.text: I kept seeing these online & listened to one in an Apple Store and finally my click finger got the best of me and I ordered. Not disappointed at all. I generally keep this in my workout room. At 30-40 mins a day (3-5 times a week), the battery lasts about 4-6 weeks having used it for three months I think I've only charged it twice since the initial charge. Sound is really good and the small size will be great for taking on trips. Havent tested the waterproofness yet, but look forward to using it poolside or generally outside & not having to worry about rain/snow.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great sound but doesn't last. Not worth $
customer_reviews.text: This I'd an amazing product and I love the sound BUT, I have used for 1.5 years and it no longer will charge. I reached out to Bose customer service and no warranty or help. They did offer to replace at a discounted cost which is $10 more than I paid originally! I expected this last longer at this cost point and based on this brand. I will not be purchasing Bose going forward.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Good premium speaker, but UE Wonderboom is competitive
customer_reviews.text: Sounds muffled at 0-20% vol, but good 20%-80% vol. After 80% the sound gets distorted. Thing gets pretty loud for the size and the build quality feels premium with the rubber material. I ended up returning the Soundlink micro though after getting a UE Wonderboom as a gift. Comparatively, the wonderboom sounds less muffled at lower volumes, can get louder at the top but has a little less bass than the Bose. The form factor of the Bose is better, though I'm not sure how well that strap will hold up over time is used actively; I think I'd rather have a place to clip a binder or a case to secure it to a bag or pole.
customer_reviews.author: iCSpEEdRaCeR

customer_reviews.title: Classic Bose
customer_reviews.text: This is a phenomenal speaker. I didn't know what to expect even though I have a total Bose home...still a small "portable" speaker that's supposed to he durable what could it produce really? Well, amazing sound for one. It's terrific and perfect for my toddler who throws (he thinks drops) items spontaneously. The sound is full and it provides plenty of volume. It's not quite as robust as the Soundlink II but I dig it for its many other qualities.
customer_reviews.author: Mysalvation

customer_reviews.title: Impressive but the app is finicky
customer_reviews.text: The sound is impressive for a speaker this size. The speaker is rugged and the strap works well. I haven't run the battery down yet because I usually plug it in after a couple hours or so. The Bluetooth connectivity is a bit sketchy. Sometimes the connection goes in and out. I haven't figured out why yet. The biggest negative is the Bose Connect app. It frequently loses the connection. I've see the "AW, SNAP!" message way too many times. (See pic.) I got the speaker on sale. It's pricey for just one speaker and I considered sending it back because of the connection problems. But it's Bose and I liked the sound more than I disliked the problems.
customer_reviews.author: Malls Are Not For Me

customer_reviews.title: BEST shower speaker period.
customer_reviews.text: This is easy to charge, easy to connect and works GREAT in the shower. The built in strap goes right around the shower rod. Keep your phone in the next room while you listen to music or a book. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mark M.

customer_reviews.title: Cool little speaker
customer_reviews.text: Love this speaker!! Bought one for myself last year. Bought one for my parents 3 months later, in Orange because it’s hard to find the black and blue one when they travel. Just bought a 3rd one for my son and his wife I. Orange too because the love that color. It’s a great little speaker and to my surprise it can be used as a speaker phone too! Delivers great sound on the go.
customer_reviews.author: FFshopper

customer_reviews.title: Great little speaker!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Exactly what I was looking for. Connects very quickly. Sound is very clear, bass is good for a speaker this size. The strap is very sturdy and secure. The battery life is actually longer than 6 hours if you use it at a normal volume instead of max volume.
customer_reviews.author: Tulani Jones

customer_reviews.title: Packs A Good Punch!
customer_reviews.text: I love this cute little speaker which actually has a great sound for the price even at louder volumes outside . To me the battery life is much longer than other speakers I've had.... I was surprised. I have a larger Bose which seems to drain more quicky. The App is simple and easy to use (I have a Samsung Galaxy 9) and links very fast and flawlessly. I got the orange color and also got a matching case for travel. I'm loving my purchase so far.
customer_reviews.author: Alaska Renegade

customer_reviews.title: Very Saddened.
customer_reviews.text: I only used this speaker for a few weeks in hotel rooms on business trip. Then it stopped powering up and wouldn't recharge. So now I have no speaker for the rest of my trip. I really expected more from such a vaunted company as Bose. I don't know why people always say they are the best. I have been burned by them before and I surely won't be buying Bose products in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Kastelic

customer_reviews.title: Great little speaker.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good sound for its size. For its size, have not found a better speaker. Yes, there are better portable speakers, but they are larger. Wish I had bought it at the current sale price of $69.00. I paid $99.00. Connects very easily. Just turn it on and it connects automatically to my phone. Battery lasts a long time. At lower volumes lasts longer than 10 hours for me.
customer_reviews.author: NMB

customer_reviews.title: 2nd purchase - gave as gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought one for myself then for Christmas 2019 I bought one on sale for my sister and her BF, who's an ultra music type and runs pro sound systems for clubs. Both love this! They love going off in their camper for the weekend. They connect to their phones and can run all their play lists and sound like they've got a multi thousand dollar sound system! It tolerates sudden rain storms, and the orange color makes it easy to spot when packing up quick!
customer_reviews.author: MissT

customer_reviews.title: Super product!  Got on amazon day for GREAT price
customer_reviews.text: I have many bose products and this one doesn't disappoint. Superior sound quality and small enough to fit in my purse. Has a nice rubberized outter skin thats nice to hold. Good battery life, good standby battery life. Sounds as good as the larger bose Bluetooth speaker...the next larger size. But this is so much smaller and easier to tote around. Very impressed. I love Bose :-)
customer_reviews.author: Mp

customer_reviews.title: Less Is More.  Small speaker...big sound.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this as a gift for my son and he expressed being very satisfied with the sound quality. I'm not an audiophile expert, and therefore I can't speak to the other less expensive units that do just fine compared to Bose. Price was not a sticking point for me. I listened to it playing music and it sounded awesome, especially for its compact size. It's also rugged and water proof, which is great for my son's rainy locale.
customer_reviews.author: JackKennan

customer_reviews.title: Everyone loves this speaker!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a Christmas present to myself, then bought another gift, then another, 3 total. I liked it so much, decided to share with others. The sound that comes from this is very close to surround sound. I don't play it loud all the time, only when jigging around, but is enough to hear all through the house even on a lower volume. Love the fact that it is so small, throw it in my pocketbook, sounds great at the park! Great piece! Love it, and so do my other gift receivers!
customer_reviews.author: JO

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent speaker. When I work outside I attach it to the back of my belt to keep it out of the way. Not sure how long the battery last since I keep it at about 50% volume but it goes way past 6 hrs at that volume. Don’t listen to the critics of this speaker. This is a $99.00 speaker that sounds excellent for $99.00 but don’t compare it to a $3,000.00 receiver connected to $4,000.00 SVS Sound speakers and sub, there is no comparison. But for what it is, it’s excellent!
customer_reviews.author: theRecipe

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: After losing my first one on the beach I had to get a new one asap! I love how cute, compact, sound quality of this speaker. I typically use it during after hours at work, and the soul purpose of this speaker is when I go bike riding! I purchased a silicone case for added protection and to clip onto whatever i put it on. The sound is really great the bass is there but not as there as other bose speakers go, for something this compact it does get loud but with loudness does come some distortion but it not as bad as other Bluetooth speaks i have used. Overall I have no complaints about this little guy :).
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

product_meta.title: Bose SoundLink Micro, Portable Outdoor Speaker, (Wireless Bluetooth Connectivity), Black
product_meta.description:
Color:Black| Style:Speaker onlyThe Bose Sound Link Micro Bluetooth speaker delivers sound so good for a speaker its size, you’ll never leave it behind. Proprietary Bose technology produces loud, clear sound—even outdoors—thanks to its custom mounted transducer and passive radiators. All from a speaker that’s at home in your hand. It’s also waterproof from the inside out, has a soft but rugged exterior and tear resistant silicone strap, so it’s ready to take with you on all life’s adventures. Attach it to your backpack or cooler, and don’t worry if it falls on the sidewalk or in the sand. And if you drop it in the pool, just dry it off and keep playing. Enjoy up to six hours of play time with a rechargeable lithium ion battery.



Pair your smartphone or tablet wirelessly and easily with Bluetooth connectivity and voice prompts. Press a button and take phone calls out loud directly through the speaker with crisp, clear Bose sound. The built in speakerphone also gives you voice access to your phone’s Siri or your Google Assistant—directly through the speaker. It even works with the Echo Dot for hands free voice control. Want even more sound? Use the free Bose Connect app to pair more than one compatible Bose Bluetooth speaker for Party Mode to play the same music through each. Or use Stereo Mode to separate right and left channels. Available in Black with Black strap, Midnight Blue with Smoky Violet strap or Bright Orange with Dark Plum strap. Included: Sound Link Micro Bluetooth speaker; USB cable.
feature_bullets: Crisp, Balanced Sound and unmatched bass for a Bluetooth speaker its size, plays loud and clear outdoors for beach days or camping trips
Built-in mic for speakerphone to take clear conference or personal calls out loud with a wireless range of approximately 30 feet.
Waterproof Speaker From the Inside Out (Ipx7 Rating), With Soft, Rugged Exterior, Resists Dents, Cracks and Scratches
Easily Portable With a Tear Resistant Strap to Bring It Wherever You Go, Strap to Your Backpack, Cooler or Handlebars
Up to 6 Hours of play time from a rechargeable battery and wireless Bluetooth pairing.
Wireless Bluetooth pairing with voice prompts allows you to easily take calls and access your phone’s virtual assistant — hands free
Pair two SoundLink speakers together for party mode or stereo mode or use Bose SimpleSync technology to pair with a member of the Bose Smart Home Family to play in sync
